article.description: Dallas Anglin scored 20 points with six assists, and Jeremy Verhagen hit two free throws with 27 seconds left to help Northern Colorado slip past Montana State 78-76 Saturday night.
article.headline: Anglin scores 20, Northern Colorado tops Montana State 78-76
article.linkText: Anglin scores 20, Northern Colorado tops Montana State 78-76
article.story: GREELEY, Colo. -- Dallas Anglin scored 20 points with six assists, and Jeremy Verhagen hit two free throws with 27 seconds left to help Northern Colorado slip past Montana State 78-76 Saturday night. Anthony Johnson scored 16, on 6-of-10 shooting, while Jordan Wilson and Jordan Davis added 10 points apiece for Northern Colorado. Wilson's third 3-pointer put the Bears (5-13, 2-4 Big Sky Conference) up 76-72 with 1:37 to play. Montana State's Tyler Hall was fouled as he hit a 3 and converted the 4-point play to tie the game with 38 seconds left. Verhagen made the go-ahead free throws 11 seconds later and Montana State (7-11, 2-4) missed two potential tying shots in the waning seconds. Tyler Hall led the Bobcats with 22 points, including five 3-pointers. Marcus Colbert added 19 while Stephan Holm and Sarp Gobeloglu scored 11 apiece.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.
